email_body:
Dear Josephine Baldi,

We hope this email finds you well. We are writing to inform you about an urgent matter that requires your immediate attention.

As a DevOps engineer and leader of the engineering team at SafeSecurity, your expertise and contributions have played a significant role in driving the success of our organization. We highly value your dedication and commitment towards our mission.

Recently, we have identified a critical security vulnerability that poses a serious threat to our systems and data. In order to ensure the safety and integrity of our operations, we need all employees, including yourself, to review the latest security guidelines and take necessary actions to secure your accounts.

To assist you in understanding the severity of this situation and the steps you should take, we have prepared a comprehensive document. Please click here to access the document.

We kindly request you to prioritize this matter and act promptly to prevent any potential breaches. Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to the IT security team.

Your commitment to maintaining a secure environment is greatly appreciated.

Best regards,

[Sender Name]
